soil¶

Soil properties (such as soil moisture, emissivity and the reflectance spectrum)

Initialized¶

select_input()

SCOPE.m

Modified¶

soil.Tsold may be changed by ebal() if options.soil_heat_method < 2 (default case)

soil.rss, soil.rbs may be changed by calc_rssrbs() if options.calc_rss_rbs is selected

Used¶

Most of the values are used by ebal(), Soil_Inertia0(), Soil_Inertia1()

soil.rs value is used by RTMf(), RTMo(), RTMt_planck(), RTMt_sb(), RTMz()

soil.CSSOIL is used by zo_and_d()

Fields¶

Fields initialized in SCOPE.m

Tsold:

only if options.soil_heat_method < 2

units:?
type:[12 x 2] double
default:20.0
refl:

soil reflectance

units:?
type:[nwl x 1] double
default:[2162 x 1] double
Ts:

initial soil surface temperature

units:?
type:[2 x 1] double
default:~15

Fields initialized in select_input() (read from input_data.xlsx)

spectrum:

Spectrum number (column in the database soil_file)

units:nan
type:double
default:1.0
rss:

soil resistance for evaporation from the pore space

units:s m-1
type:double
default:500.0
rs_thermal:

broadband soil reflectance in the thermal range (1-emissivity)

units:nan
type:double
default:0.06
cs:

specific heat capacity of the soil

units:J kg-1 K-1
type:double
default:1180.0
rhos:

specific mass of the soil

units:kg m-3
type:double
default:1800.0
CSSOIL:

Verhoef et al. (1997) Drag coefficient for soil (from Aerodynamic)

units:nan
type:double
default:0.01
lambdas:

heat conductivity of the soil

units:J m-1 K-1
type:double
default:1.55
rbs:

soil boundary layer resistance (from Aerodynamic)

units:s m-1
type:double
default:10.0
SMC:

volumetric soil moisture content in the root zone

units:nan
type:double
default:0.25
BSMBrightness:

BSM model parameter for soil brightness

units:nan
type:double
default:0.5
BSMlat:

BSM model parameter ‘lat’

units:nan
type:double
default:25.0
BSMlon:

BSM model parameter ‘long’

units:nan
type:double
default:45.0

Derived variables

GAM:

produced by Soil_Inertia0() or Soil_Inertia1() if options.soil_heat_method

units:?
type:double
default:~1814. Soil_Inertia0()
